resources.string: Click this if your network provider is %s
Click this if you are testing in Emulator
We need to read your location in order to provide you with the best offers available in your region. We value your privacy! We will never sell or misuse your personal information.
We want you to have the best experience possible. We would like to auto fetch your phone number from your device. We would never violate your personal information
The app requires accessibility permission in order to interpret the incoming USSD messages for the device.
